notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Organization of the study, J.A. and D.S.N.; plant material and essential oil extraction, V.M.S., C.G.M. and D.S.N.; isolation and structure identification of compounds, J.A., M.F.M.P., M.V.L.R.A. and D.R.S.; antioxidant and cytotoxicity assay, D.G., J.S.S., M.A.V.d.C. and L.A.; writingâ€”review and editing, J.A., D.S.N., D.G. and L.A. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
